text: How do people generally patch other peoples packages to work on the GPU?  For example, I am currently waiting on <<https://github.com/JuliaArrays/StructArrays.jl/pull/177>>.  Will the new context aware dispatch in GPUCompiler help us to not have to push all the changes upstream?  Further, sometimes what you want to do on the GPU may be different than what you want on the CPU.  Should one add package specific cassette pass to KernelAbstractions?
